text: Tempura is not created equal. There I said it. You don't realize the difference between regular tempura and fine dining tempura till you actually come to a tempura fine dining restaurant like Tentsuru. It's not just the freshness and quality of the produce but the attention and care taken to prepare each tempura item. The attention to detail for each step of the process right down to the recommendation of different condiments for each item is wonderful. All of it together combines to an impeccable dining experience that is attentive but not stuffy or intrusive. A truly delicious and enjoyable dining experience. Hopefully, the pictures show how each tempura item was perfectly cooked and how well thought out the progression of the meal was.

The raw seafood is very fresh, also really like all of the tempura, they have a very special setting and menu is top-notch, chef will introduce the ingredients before cooking.. Thank you to the friendly and mindful Tentsuru team, you have the best service! Definitely would come back again

An outstanding dining experience! Kudos to the service team, they were incredibly attentive and made us feel like VIPs, ensuring every detail was perfect. Each course in the tempura omakase was crafted was exceptional. The high-end atmosphere and meticulous presentation made it ideal for a top-tier experience. I celebrated my birthday here, and it truly made the occasion special. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to elevate a celebration or enjoy an unforgettable meal!

Enjoyed a nice lunch at Tentsuru. All the ingredients were super fresh and the tempura batter was light and crispy. The star of the show is definitely the uni roll.

Kudos to the masterful chef and friendly staff!

I did not know that Uni and even egg yolk can be tempura'ed. Surprising take on tempura and really creative dishes were served throughout the night! It is not cheap, but the experience will make you understand that not all tempura were created equal!
